title: Live Updates: Killing of Top Hamas Leader in Iran Raises Risk of Wider War
content: Hamas accused Israel of assassinating Ismail Haniyeh, who was in Tehran for the inauguration of Iran’s new president, and Iran vowed to retaliate. Israel has not talked about the killing.

title: Ismail Haniyeh, a Top Hamas Leader, Is Dead at 62
